p: Citronellol and eugenol compounds are very active against the influenza virus after only 10 mins ofexposure [ 88]. The common components in rose oil, including nerol, citral, citronellal, citronellol, geraniol, and eugenol, show antiviral activity against herpes simplex virus type-1 (HSV-1) and parainfluenza virus type-3 (PI-3) [ 89]. Geraniol also shows low antiviral activity against coxsacki virus B1 (CVB1) replication with a selective index of 3.9 [ 90].
